channel.title: I am a coder looking for a server to code
channel.description: i am a coder looking for a server to code because i cant run mine because my dad said im not aloud to port forward so i am looking for some1 elses server to code and make better im just a begginer but im still pritty good at it i know the basics and still practising on my server but i know enough atm i know how to add items into shops, add drops, add items, add item prices, add item bonus, and i know how to help people so is you could please leave me a private message if you would like me to code id be happy and i will reply and hopfully we can get to some sort of agreement =) thanks for reading

item.title: I am a coder looking for a server to code
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Please do not post anymore topics in the wrong section. Furthermore, even though we appreciate the offer, you don’t need to publicly offer yourself as a programmer. If you wish to help, answer people’s questions in this section.

Read full topic
item.source: I am a coder looking for a server to code
